item.title: Macro Management
item.description: At my current org work culture is nice and I have seen hardly anyone left in my team in last 4 years. One of the reason for this is the management style which I call macro management. I am trying to write down what is it and how it works. The goal of macro management is below Creating a non interruptive environment where people can do deep work which they enjoy.
